snippet: Moktada al-Sadr, the influential anti-American Shiite cleric, told his followers in Parliament to continue to serve, but not on his behalf.
abstract: Moktada al-Sadr, anti-American Shiite cleric, reaffirms he is withdrawing from Iraqi politics, telling his followers in Parliament to continue to serve but not on his behalf; encourages all Iraqis to participate in nation's elections and criticizes government of Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki.
lead_paragraph: Moktada al-Sadr, the influential anti-American Shiite cleric, told his followers in Parliament to continue to serve, but not on his behalf.

headline.main: Iraqi Cleric, Exiting Politics, Urges Others to Keep Serving
headline.print_headline: Iraqi Cleric, Exiting Politics, Urges Others to Keep Serving
